article_title: Voices: Tom Daley, On Choosing the Best RIA Model
article_text:
Voices is an occasional column that allows wealth managers to address issues of interest to the advisory community. Tom Daley is the founder and chief executive of Lake Zurich, Ill.-based The Advisor Center, an online job resource for financial advisers.

One of the questions I hear most often from advisers is whether they should join the increasing ranks of registered investment advisers. While RIAs have been a hot trend in the...

twitter.description: "An adviser should move to the model that provides them with the ability to best serve their existing clients, attract new clients, and operate their business with a level of independence that feels comfortable."
twitter.title: Voices: Tom Daley, On Choosing the Best RIA Model

image.alt: Tom Daley: Advisers Need To Remember Not All RIAs Are Alike
